review: Andy Wachowski and Lana Wachowski are not the greatest directors ever, in fact most of their films are very unknown, but they really managed to pull this one out of the bag, the idea of computer hacking and slow motion parkour, dodging bullets, fist fighting action really made a great film. But for such a film requires good actors, that's were Laurence Fishburne comes in, Laurence Fishburne was and still is a great actor and has stared in some sensational films.Although it unfortunately won no Oscars I still thoroughly enjoyed it. Although I did enjoy the original 'Matrix' I found it went downhill soon after.
